description: This Java source file defines the ZithShell class, which sets up and runs a shell interface for a mock Zigbee network environment. It includes configuration for logging, command definitions (start, stop, debug control, quit), and UI components such as status line updates and prompt provider for an interactive shell.

classes.name: ZithShell
classes.description: Main configuration and entry point class that initializes and runs the interactive shell environment.

classes.name: StatusLine
classes.description: Inner class managing the display of status information in the shell, including server, client, and Zigbee states.

classes.name: ZithPromptProvider
classes.description: Inner class implementing PromptProvider to give a custom prompt ('zith>').

classes.name: QuitCommand
classes.description: Inner component implementing command to exit the shell.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that configures terminal type, logging, initializes the Spring application context, and runs the shell.

methods.name: inputProvider
methods.description: Bean providing input reading functionality for the shell.

methods.name: statusLine
methods.description: Bean creating a StatusLine instance for shell status display.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status line with current server, client, and zigbee states.

methods.name: startAll
methods.description: Shell command to start the mock Zigbee core.

methods.name: stopAll
methods.description: Shell command to stop the mock Zigbee core.

methods.name: configureLogging
methods.description: Configures logging via logback.xml and slf4j bridge.

methods.name: quit
methods.description: Command to exit the shell cleanly.
